StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetTrainingProvidedRecords]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @TrainingTypeId int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT TP.ID, TP.TrainingFileID, TP.TrainingDate, TP.TrainingTypeID, TP.TrainingProvidedTypeID, TP.Subject, TP.Hours, TP.ConductedBy, TP.RecruiterSignatureID, U1.FirstName RecruiterFirstName, U1.MiddleName RecruiterMiddleName, U1.LastName RecruiterLastName, TP.NCOICSignatureID, U2.FirstName SNCOICFirstName, U2.MiddleName SNCOICMiddleName, U2.LastName SNCOICLastName FROM USMC.TrainingProvided TP LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U1 ON U1.UserID = TP.RecruiterSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U2 ON U2.UserID = TP.NCOICSignatureID WHERE TP.TrainingFileID = @TrainingFileId and TP.TrainingProvidedTypeID = @TrainingTypeId ORDER BY TP.TrainingDate DESC
END
